objects.specification: A large rectangular floor panel with a smooth matte finish in a neutral elegant color palette, modeling a high-quality tile texture with subtle tonal variations. The surface extends 10 meters in width and 15 meters in depth, providing a spacious and durable foundation for the booth area. It features a slight bevel at the edges for a refined transition to the walls.

A vertical wall panel standing 3 meters tall with a smooth matte finish in a neutral light grey tone, enclosing the back of the booth. The panel has a minimalistic seamless surface, providing a clean backdrop for branding and banners. Its sturdy 0.1-meter thickness imparts a solid, professional appearance.

A vertical wall panel standing 3 meters tall with a smooth matte finish in a neutral light grey tone, enclosing the front of the booth. The panel has a minimalistic seamless surface, providing a clean boundary while remaining open for visitor entry. Its sturdy 0.1-meter thickness imparts a solid, professional appearance.

A vertical sidewall panel 3 meters in height with a smooth matte finish in a neutral light grey tone, enclosing the left side of the booth. The seamless design ensures a clean border, and the 0.1-meter thickness provides structural solidity.

A vertical sidewall panel 3 meters in height with a smooth matte finish in a neutral light grey tone, enclosing the right side of the booth. The seamless design ensures a clean border, and the 0.1-meter thickness provides structural solidity.

A realistic demo car model with an aerodynamic silhouette, finished in a glossy metallic red paint for high visual impact. It features tinted glass windows, detailed alloy wheels, sculpted body lines, and authentic headlight and grille elements. The proportions measure approximately 4.5 meters in length, 2 meters in width, and 1.4 meters in height.

A sleek rectangular information stand in bright yellow accent color with a matte finish. It features a 0.5-meter wide upright panel mounted on a slim base, designed to hold branding graphics or digital screens. The modern design creates a clear, unobtrusive display point.

A sleek rectangular information stand in bright yellow accent color with a matte finish. It features a 0.5-meter wide upright panel mounted on a slim base, designed to hold branding graphics or digital screens. The modern design creates a clear, unobtrusive display point.

A modern reception counter finished in a glossy blue accent color with a minimalist design. The counter measures 2 meters wide and 1 meter deep, featuring a smooth top surface and subtle recessed panels for storage. Its clean lines and elegant finish create an inviting focal point at the booth entrance.

A rectangular branded banner plane in a lightweight frameless design, measuring 3 meters wide and 1 meter high. It displays a high-resolution car brand logo and slogan with vibrant print quality, mounted flush to the wall with hidden fixtures for a seamless appearance.

A compact decorative spotlight fixture with a sleek metallic housing in a matte finish. It features an adjustable gimbal head and a bright white LED light source, designed to be ceiling-mounted and angled downward to cast a focused beam highlighting the demo car.
